error.signature: PersistentVolumeClaim is stuck in Pending state
error.regex: PersistentVolumeClaim.*Pending|no persistent volumes available|waiting for a volume to be created

verdict.summary: PVC can't find a matching PV. No StorageClass provisioner or no available storage.

dead_ends.action: Manually create a PV with exact specs
dead_ends.why_fails: Manual PVs don't scale and are hard to manage
Won't help if the underlying issue is no StorageClass or no space

workarounds.action: Check if a default StorageClass exists: kubectl get storageclass
Create a StorageClass or set one as default if missing
For local dev, use local-path provisioner or hostPath
workarounds.how:
# Install local-path provisioner (for development):
kubectl apply -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rancher/local-path-provisioner/master/deploy/local-path-storage.yaml

# Or use hostPath (single-node only):
kind: PersistentVolume
spec:
  hostPath:
    path: /tmp/data
  storageClassName: manual

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'PersistentVolumeClaim is stuck in Pending state' is a storage_error error while 'persistentvolumeclaim is in pending state' has a different failure mode despite similar symptoms. Check error message details to differentiate.
